mapper.select: select shopNo, shopNumber, shopDomain, shopAddress, shopTitle, shopAuth, shopEmail, shopLogo, shopDesc, shopHeader from shop where shopDomain=#{shopDomain}
select shopNo, shopNumber, shopAddress, shopTitle, shopDomain from shop
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET shopTitle = #{shopTitle}, shopDesc = #{shopDesc}, shopLogo = #{shopLogo}, shopHeader = #{shopHeader}, shopAddress = #{shopAddress}, shopAuth = #{shopAuth}, shopNumber = #{shopNumber}, shopEmail = #{shopEmail} WHERE shopDomain = #{shopDomain}
